item.title: About Marc
item.description: Is a Software Developer and Technical Architect with over 10years of industry experience. Specialises in backend, integrations, and architecture. Knowledgeable in scrum, and agile methodologies. Has worked with the following stacks and technology: PHP, ES6/Javascript, Python HTML, CSS, React SQL, NoSQL, Elasticsearch Git Docker, Ansible Linux, Nginx, Apache Has experience working with and implementing: End-to-end and automated tests Continuous integration (CI), Continuous delivery (CD) Headless architecture Automated Accessibility tests Also curious about Golang, Serverless Framework, Machine Learning, Data Science.
